attributes.action: We need to stop this level of deforestation
attributes.additional_details: We know how long these trees take to grow so we need to plant more before we take more this is so simple to do as well
attributes.background: So this orangutan is fighting for is home to not be cut down - the level of these animals starving and dying due to this is at an all-time high and they're not the only animals that are affected - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DdRMuQiv0No

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about deforestation, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
